OOC: Jason, I own the first episode of TF:G1, in the North
American/Europian continuity, and none of that happaned.
You are pretty cose on some things, but are wrong for the most part. I
also own the first Marvel TF comics, in the North American continuity,
and none of that happaned there either. And since the Asian cartoon
continuity follows the NA/E continuity in the begining, and the Asian
and Europian comics follow the NA continuity in the begining, I dont see
how any of what you said could have happaned.
